programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Thailand: The Wild Heart
programme.desc: Thailand is a land of extremes. A country shaped by wild forces, where animals face tough challenges to survive. Tropical rainforests, primeval caves, mangrove swamps, and rocky shorelines provide homes for remarkable creatures.

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Egypt: Survivors in the Sands

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Madagascar: Islands of Monsters

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Taiga: The Frozen Forest
programme.desc: Containing one third of the world's trees, the frozen forests of the Taiga are the lungs of the planet. This great forest spans across shores of the Pacific, sheltering some of the Earth's most majestic animals, and some of its most secretive.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire

programme.desc: When an old man is killed, Beka, Rhade and Harper are the main suspects and stand trial.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rhade leads the rebels in battle against a warlord on Seefra-5.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of 53-year-old, Cynthia Greenwood-Smith, to unravel the lies and discover the grim truth surrounding her disappearance from her Gold Coast home in 2001.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Thrill Kill: The Janine Balding Murder
programme.desc: On a September night in 1986, two police officers climbed through a barbed-wire fence beside the F4 freeway at Minchinbury in Sydney’s west.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Assassination of John Newman
programme.desc: John Paul Newman was a member of the New South Wales state parliament and a member of the seat of Cabramatta.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing
programme.desc: We investigate the story of David and Catherine Birnie, Australia's most sadistic husband and wife killing team, who tortured, raped and murdered four women in 1986.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Six months on from Claire’s death, Tess (Bridie Carter) has thrown herself into her work with an almost manic intensity.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Tess (Bridie Carter) is disconcerted to learn Stevie (Simmone Jade Mackinnon) can “read” her so well whilst playing poker. Stevie explains the theory of ‘tells” – signs that give away what a person is really thinking.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Late at night Tess (Bridie Carter) is woken by a strange noise in the kitchen and discovers Stevie helping herself to a beer from the fridge. Both however are subsequently surprised by a stranger called Jack Blake.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: When Harry (Marshall Napier) offers Alex (Aaron Jeffery) and Nick (Myles Pollard) a partnership deal in Killarney after he dies on the proviso that they give up Wilgul and move back home now, the boys become even more determined to save their farm.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Running low on petrol, Stevie (Simmone Jade Mackinnon) and Terry (John Jarratt) stop at a decrepit truckstop run by an old drunk named Ken Logan (Harold Hopkins).

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: Tess (Bridie Carter) has some extra feed on her hands, having inadvertently over-ordered. She gives it to Nick (Myles Pollard) and Alex (Aaron Jeffery).

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Family Plot
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lucas, Ohio for two cases. The first stop, to look into phenomena connected to a gruesome event, The Ceely Rose Murders.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to King George, Virginia to become the first paranormal team to investigate Belle Grove Plantation.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Nine Men's Misery
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Cumberland Library & Monastery in Cumberland, Rhode Island where \\"the practice of silence\\" has been disturbed by a brutal past.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: An Officer and an Apparition
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS and 2 special guests investigate the Brunswick Old City Hall where an officer was shot and killedin the 1890's. Will TAPS discover that he's still on duty?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Textbook Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to an abandoned school in Barnegat, New Jersey. Could the apparition of a beloved community teacher be luring children inside the building or are other spirits at play?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 200th Episode: Grant is Back
programme.desc: On this 2 hour special, TAPS celebrates their 200th episode by re-visiting one of their favorite and most haunted locations, Trans-Allegheny Lunatic Asylum and by calling on old friends, Grant, Dustin and Joe.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Courage
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mess with Texas
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monumental Changes
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adapt, Improvise, and Overcome
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Deep Dish Disaster
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Traffic Jammin'
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Arigato, Mr. Roboto
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Inane Clown Posse
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Doggin' and Draggin'
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Raising the Roof
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Bugaboo
programme.desc: Gary swoops in to help Andi. Sabrina helps Maurice prepare for an exciting event. Danni has to decide her feelings about her new situation. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Give Me The Night
programme.desc: Sabrina becomes an unlikely hero after stumbling upon a terrible incident. Andi fights back. Danni ventures out in an effort to put herself out there again. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Chance To Love
programme.desc: Gary's insecurities come to light. Karen and Zac find themselves in a familiar place. Danni finds herself the mediator between friends. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Chardonnay's sorority sister is in town to cheer her up after hearing of her divorce. Jason makes a play to get back with Kelly. Malik joins Keira at her acting class.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Jason rents Phatty's for a private dinner with Kelly, taking an enhancement drug in the process. Malik tries to quell his feelings for Keira, leading to some awkward moments.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Things heat up on the Season 8 finale. Jason gets a serious promotion. Blue starts to suspect that there is something going on between Malik and Keira. Malik and Keira let their emotions get the best of them.

programme.title: The Game: Away Game
programme.desc: Derwin invites Melanie to his first away game in Miami, but due to her heavy school load, she decides to pass.

programme.title: The Game: The Rules Of The Game
programme.desc: As a favor to Derwin, Melanie attends the first Saber Sunbeam meeting of the season, only to learn that unlike the wives, football players "girlfriends" are not considered legitimate and are treated as such by the other wives.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Cemetery
programme.desc: PRS visits a gothic graveyard, where a jealous spirit seems to be preying on the newlywed wife of the cemetery's caretaker. Ryan traces the haunting to a mysterious, unclaimed cremation urn on the grounds.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all but forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The National Emergency Services Gallery
programme.desc: A terrifying place full of history and paranormal activity. The team are tested as the try to find the spirits that refuse to leave this famous location.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Galleries of Justice
programme.desc: The legendary ghost hunters continue in Nottingham and a place where people could be jailed, sentenced and executed without even leaving the building.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 1
programme.desc: The first of a two-part investigation with celebrity guests, world famous band ‘Bullet for My Valentine’.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Newton House Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 of this spin-chilling episode. Nursing their wounds from the last episode the team and their celebrity guests ‘Bullet For My Valentine’ carry on.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 1
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan become counselors at a camp for children with cancer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are helping patients at Camp Good Times in different ways. But a father still refuses to deal with his son's illness.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Bless the Boys in Blue
programme.desc: Jonathan relinquishes his angelic powers for awhile and realizes the dangers that Mark has faced being a police officer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Cindy
programme.desc: An aspiring actress wants to be accepted for who she really is, not in the image her well-meaning dad tries to transform her into.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Devil and Jonathan Smith
programme.desc: Mark has been tricked into selling his soul in order to save a little girl's life. But the Devil has another agenda: acquiring Jonathan's soul.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Danny and Alice are enjoying being together but agree to keep their relationship under wraps for the moment. However, they're unaware Georgina has heard their every word!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: Danny and Alice's project to re-habilitate a group of circus elephants has been a huge success but now they have too many elephants on Leopard's Den, so they urgently need to move the circus herd to the National Park.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Leopard's Den is helping to build a new school in the township but when Danny hurts his back he begins to have a crisis about his age. Danny and Alice are surprised when Vanessa comes to them for advice.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Mara is hosting a beauty pageant and Rowan realises he needs all the publicity he can get. He buys a tiger from a zoo and convinces Alice he plans to rehabilitate it. Alice is enjoying working with her brother and even defends him to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Alice have been preparing a cheetah for release in the wild but for some reason Danny's mind isn't on the job. He's been pre-occupied because he plans to buy a ring and propose to Alice!

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Danny and Alice are taking a well deserved holiday but Olivia's upset to learn they're leaving that day. Angry at missing out on a driving lesson, she decides to take the jeep out on her own.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Primal Instinct
programme.desc: When a drunken dispute at a biker bar turns deadly, Kenda must launch a manhunt for a pair of suspects who fled with a small boy in tow.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: We Kill the Ones We Love
programme.desc: A drive-by shooting leaves Van Terry dead; to crack the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must put his faith… in a burglar.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Sing Sing, Little Bird
programme.desc: A romantic rendezvous is cut short by a violent home invasion, leaving young business owner Kelly Knudson bleeding to death on the floor and Lt Joe Kenda is short on leads.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Gathering of Evil
programme.desc: Teen runaway Maggie Fetty is found strangled to death on a mountain road. An anonymous tipster blames Maggie’s best friend, but she accuses a mental patient with multiple personalities.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Point of No Return
programme.desc: When a mysterious explosion rocks a sleepy suburb, it’s up to Kenda to ID a pile of charred remains and find the killer who triggered the blast.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Sadie and Calder
programme.desc: Allen and Erin Carrasco ‘s Basset Hound Sadie whines and moans whenever Allen is around. Blue Heeler mix Calder is a great dog by day, but bedtime rituals unleash unwelcome night terrors.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bebe and Lola
programme.desc: English bulldog Bebe has turned against her pack mate, as well as the household furnishings. Comedian Howie Mandel and his wife, Terry, have their hands full with 2 year old Chihuahua Lola.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hardy- Attacked with Love
programme.desc: Shelly Dale’s pampered French Bulldog Hardy has started snapping at regular clients at her hair salon in Newport Beach, California, so has been banished to a corner to avoid further incidents.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Sooner & Trace, and Casanova
programme.desc: Not a lover, but a fighter, a young dog attacks other dogs while on leash. Two formerly friendly sibling dogs are now at each others’ throats. Can Cesar keep these dogs in line?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Stanley, Shoven and Leo
programme.desc: Stanley, a surly Chihuahua mix, has a problem with attacking joggers. Two Pomeranians are known for their shrill barks. Shelter rescue Leo, performs a tight rope act when hearing a cough.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders travel to a parallel dimension, which at first glance seems like paradise. Money is given to play the lottery, streets are quiet... it's life in the slow lane and very pleasant.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: On a world where males have been rendered impotent, females eager to repopulate greet the male Sliders as "love gods.''

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Trapped and separated from the other Sliders, Quinn finds himself on an astral plane where only a young girl named Gillian can see or hear him.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Quinn is mistaken for a gunslinger in a world where the code of the Wild West still prevails.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers: NEW Brenda Delgado

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers
programme.desc: Teenager Jay Sewell's life was taken in a brutal attack orchestrated by jealous Daniel Grogan, who had heard that Jay was seeing his former girlfriend.

programme.desc: The evidence for Bigfoot piles up, causing some to wonder who has been keeping information from the public.

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Everglades National Park

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Hawaii Volcanoes National Park

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Joshua Tree National Park
programme.desc: Joshua Tree National Park: Are UFO sightings at Joshua Tree linked to an anti-aging machine and a powerful creature called the Yucca Man?

programme.title: National Park Mysteries: Mount Shasta National Forest
programme.desc: Mount Shasta National Forest: From inexplicable disappearances to mysterious experiments, events in Mount Shasta National Park may be explained by an ancient Karuk Indian legend.

programme.desc: Bob and crew are demolishing an old barn for Farmer Pickles, but as Lofty tests his demolition ball he accidentally damages one of the pillars at the entrance to Bob’s yard. Wendy offers to stay and repair this while Bob gets on with the day’s job.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: A new machine has come to the Valley – Packer the Delivery Truck. He’s to work with Farmer Pickles team. Farmer Pickles gives Packer his jobs and he sets off on his first delivery round.

programme.title: The Legend of the Golden Hammer
programme.desc: Our first sight of Fixham is in the episodic special The Legend Of The Golden Hammer. The Legend of the Golden Hammer consists of six stories in which Bob and his team tackle building jobs at six of Fixham’s key locations.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Philpotts
programme.desc: When six children died in a house fire in Allenton, Derby in May 2012 it shocked the nation. Parents Mick and Mairead Philpott were charged with the murders. We uncover the reasons behind the arson attack on their own home.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: April Jones
programme.desc: The hunt for five year old April Jones was the largest missing persons search in UK police history when she vanished in October 2012. But on October 6th a local man, Mark Bridger, was charged with her disappearance.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Stephen Lawrence
programme.desc: On the 20th anniversary of his death, the family of Stephen Lawrence reflect on his tragic murder in 1993, as well as their lengthy fight for justice.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Lee Rigby
programme.desc: In broad daylight on a busy Woolwich street on 22nd May 2013, serving soldier Fusilier Lee Rigby was attacked and murdered by Islamic extremists Michael Adebolajo and Michael Adebowale.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Raoul Moat
programme.desc: The hunt for Raoul Moat was one of the largest in British history, after he wounded his ex-girlfriend, killed her new partner and shot and blinded police constable David Rathband.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Sarah Payne
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Sarah Payne's disappearance and murder shocked the nation. Here, Sarah's mum reveals her tireless campaign to protect other children from paedophilia.

programme.title: Girlfriends: In Too Deep

programme.title: Girlfriends: Bad Blood
programme.desc: Joan (Tracee Ellis Ross) starts to realize that Maya’s (Golden Brooks) house has become the hang-out spot and that she is no longer the center of the friendship.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Everybody Hate Monica

programme.title: Girlfriends: Hustle & Dough
programme.desc: In trying to seriously pursue her music career, Lynn (Persia White) informs the girls that she is performing at a local club during open mic night.

programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) discovers Jabari (Kendre Berry) has been skipping school and plagiarized a major writing assignment.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Just Joan

programme.title: Girlfriends: Karaoke-Dokee

programme.title: Girlfriends: He Had a Dream

programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) fears that Jabari (Kendre Berry) is growing up too fast after she and Darnell (Khalil Kain) witness an interaction between him and a young girl.
